QuestData.Title: Sparks of Life: The Forbidden Reach
QuestData.Description:
The Forbidden Reach is enveloped with the vibrancy of the Dragon Isles.
Go explore and capture sparks, but stay weary for any combatants you may encounter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Sparks of Life in The Forbidden Reach, while in War Mode.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Fieldmaster Emberath in Valdrakken.
